channel.title: Uncutweb Winds Edition Beta 1 - Yes It's back!
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]Uncutweb Winds Edition Beta 1[/b][/size]
Yeah it's back. After a very long time of development. I am ready to test it!
The beta url: http://beta.uncutweb.com
The new Uncutweb Winds Edition includes:
* Faster, more organized with the Smarty Template Engine. * New professional theme 'Winds' by Bryan C. (The owner and creator of Uncutweb) * More user friendly than ever, including icons, better bbcode editor, and more. * Forums can now have more than one category. * Topics can now be closed by moderators. * Topics now show the post numbers and links are organized with the post number. * New and improved members list that lets you organize it the way you want. * Portfolios are now known as profiles * etc, etc, etc...
First of all, let me show you the previous versions:
[b]Screenshots of older versions.[/b] This is where I will post screenshots of the older versions so you guys can see my progress.
[b]Beta 1:[/b] This is the first version I have ever made.
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/xkyu5t.jpg[/img]
[b]Beta 3:[/b] This is the third version I have made. This one used better CSS styling.
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2cqhgeo.jpg[/img]
[b]Beta 4:[/b] This was the last beta version.
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/15mxv6a.jpg[/img]
[b]Final Beta 1:[/b] This was the final beta version that was the previous release to the current one you see right now.
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/33tpfes.jpg[/img]
[size=13pt]OK NOW FOR THE NEW VERSION SCREENSHOTS![/size]
[img]http://i29.tinypic.com/4fvdb4.png[/img]
[img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2mwxlhj.png[/img]
[img]http://i30.tinypic.com/1zoj1va.png[/img]
[img]http://i28.tinypic.com/de3287.png[/img]
[img]http://i32.tinypic.com/t53qmo.png[/img]

item.title: Uncutweb Winds Edition Beta 1 - Yes It's back!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It actually looks very good. The only suggestion I have, and you don’t have to follow it. Is that I find forum software that has different files, such as vB, (topic.php, forum.php) much more insecure or at least more possibilities for security flaws, then software such as SMF that sends everything through one file (index.php)

That way you can handle all of the security and login stuff with the exact same code on the exact same file. It’s sort of a preference thing, but I like it better.

Anyway, are you going to allow others to use this or just keeping it to yourself?

Read full topic
item.source: Uncutweb Winds Edition Beta 1 - Yes It's back!

[quote=“bjc22, post:3, topic:297319”]Bryan C. is me. And Winds well… I used to call the past project Steadfast so I thought Winds sounded cool. (MMhh gas attack?)

I pretty much recoded the entire thing with the Smarty Template Engine. Then I tested it for bugs as much as I could by myself. Spent months working on this baby. :)[/quote]
Oh, so not this guy.

In that case, I revoke my laughter. Good job.

Yeah it’s back. After a very long time of development. I am ready to test it!

The beta url: http://beta.uncutweb.com

The new Uncutweb Winds Edition includes:

* Faster, more organized with the Smarty Template Engine.
* New professional theme 'Winds' by Bryan C. (The owner and creator of Uncutweb)
